note.p: Education: Drawing academy of the Royal Dublin Society, under Robert Lucius West; Royal Academy (1790)

Career: Moved to London (1788); sitters included members of the Royal Family; visited Paris (1802); wrote poetry; involved in establishing the British Institution (1807); resigned as President of the Royal Academy (1845) but yielded to requests to remain
Memberships: ARA (1798); RA (1800, President 1830-1850); Society of Dilettanti (1830)
